Posts.Content: Dec 7, 2007 09:38PM BonBon wrote: From my experience with stereotactic biopsy and the old excise method, I learned that the former is 1000 times more accurate, helpful and worth the misery of the process.  In your situation I would have another MRI done by the Supervisor of your medical outfit, and have her/your MRI radiologist analyze a comparison of the two  to  find out what is the Truth.  If you can't get  them  to do this for you, you are in the Wrong Place.   I would contact Marissa Weiss  right away as to what  SHE would recommend You Do,  Dear.
Posts.Title: From DCIS to 5-cm tumor??? How can that be??? Believer0711 Believer0711
